meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>leap</kanji> so the verb vocab version means <vocabulary>to leap</vocabulary>. It also means <vocabulary>to jump</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to bounce</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You go <vocabulary>to leap</vocabulary> and leap again. You do it so much that you start sweating, which is causing a foul <reading>odo</reading>r (おど) to come from your body.
